com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol

Class SmcItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol.SmcItem

  • public class SmcItem
extends Object
    This class represents a media item (audio, video or image) or a folder.

    Use this class for exchanging media item or folder metadata between devices. You can obtain an SmcItem instance from another device or generate an instance in your application when the content is located in the local device or on the web.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SmcItem.LocalContent
      This class provides methods for creating an instance of a media resource from content on the local device.
      static interface  SmcItem.Resource
      This interface supports content resource management.
      static class  SmcItem.WebContent
      This class provides methods for creating an instance of a media resource from content on the web.

    • Method Detail

      • getDate

        public Date getDate()
        Get the content creation date.
        Returns:
        The date the content was created. This method returns null if no content creation date information is available.

      • getTitle

        public String getTitle()
        Get the content title.
        Returns:
        The title of the content. This method returns null if no title information is available.

      • getMediaType

        public int getMediaType()
        Get the media content type.
        Returns:
        The media content type. Valid values are:
        • MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_AUDIO
        • MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_FOLDER
        • MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_IMAGE
        • MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_VIDEO
        • MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_UNKNOWN

      • getUri

        public Uri getUri()
        Get the content URI.

        To get the list of all SmcItem instances, use the getResourceList() method because some content may have multiple URIs.

        Returns:
        The URI of the content. This method returns null if no content URI information is available.

      • getBundle

        public Bundle getBundle()
        Get the content bundle.
        Returns:
        The content bundle.

      • getAlbumTitle

        public String getAlbumTitle()
        Get the content album title.
        Returns:
        The album title of the content. This method returns an empty string if no album title information is available.

      • getArtist

        public String getArtist()
        Get the content artist name.
        Returns:
        The name of the content artist. This method returns an empty string if no artist name information is available.

      • getGenre

        public String getGenre()
        Get the content genre.

        Returns:
        The genre of the content. This method returns an empty string if no genre information is available.

      • getDuration

        public long getDuration()
        Get the content duration in seconds.

        Returns:
        The duration of the content in seconds. This method returns -1 if no duration information is available.

      • isRootFolder

        public boolean isRootFolder()
        Check if the content is a root folder.
        Returns:
        • true - if the item is a root folder.
        • false - if the item is not a root folder.

      • getThumbnail

        public Uri getThumbnail()
        Get the content thumbnail URI.
        Returns:
        The URI of the content thumbnail. This method returns null if no thumbnail information is available. For music, this method returns the URI of the album cover art.

      • getResolution

        public String getResolution()
        Get the content resolution.

        The resolution format is "width x height".

        Returns:
        The resolution of the content. This method returns an empty string if no resolution information is available.

      • getLocation

        public Location getLocation()
        Get the content geolocation data.
        Returns:
        The geolocation data for the content. This method returns null if no geolocation information is available.

      • getSubtitle

        public Uri getSubtitle()
        Get the content subtitles URI.
        Returns:
        The URI for the content subtitles. This method returns null if no subtitles information is available.

      • getFileSize

        public long getFileSize()
        Get the content file size in kilobytes.
        Returns:
        The file size of the content. This method returns -1 if no file size information is available.

      • getMimeType

        public String getMimeType()
        Get the content MIME type.
        Returns:
        The MIME type of the content. This method returns an empty string if no MIME type information is available.

      • getExtension

        public String getExtension()
        Get the content file extension.
        Returns:
        The file extension of the content. The method returns an empty string if no file extension information is available.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Object o)
        Check if the specified object is the same as the current SmcItem object.

        Overrides:

        equals in class Object

        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Returns:
        • true - if the two objects are equal.
        • false - if the two objects are not equal.

      • getContentType

        public int getContentType()
        Get the content type.
        Returns:
        The type of the content. The valid values are:
        • CONTENT_TYPE_LOCAL
        • CONTENT_TYPE_PROVIDER
        • CONTENT_TYPE_WEB
        • CONTENT_TYPE_UNKNOWN

      • getWebContentDeliveryMode

        public int getWebContentDeliveryMode()
        Get the web content delivery mode.
        Returns:
        The web content delivery mode. The valid values are:
        • SmcItem.WebContent.DELIVERY_MODE_REDIRECT
        • SmcItem.WebContent.DELIVERY_MODE_RELAY
        • SmcItem.WebContent.DELIVERY_MODE_UNKNOWN
        If the SmcItem instance is not created with SmcItem.WebContent, this method returns DELIVERY_MODE_UNKNOWN.

      • getSeekMode

        public int getSeekMode()
        Get the content seek mode.
        Returns:
        The seek mode. The valid values are:
        • SEEK_MODE_BYTE
        • SEEK_MODE_TIME
        • SEEK_MODE_ANY
        • SEEK_MODE_NONE

      • getBitrate

        public int getBitrate()
        Get the content bit rate in bps.
        Returns:
        The bit rate in bps of the content. The method returns -1 if no bit rate information is available.

      • getResourceList

        public List<SmcItem.Resource> getResourceList()
        Get the list of all SmcItem instances.

        To get a URI for a piece of content, use the getUri()method.

        Returns:
        The list of URIs of all SmcItem instances. The method returns an empty list if no information is available.
